summary: Place 3 Harpies wherever you want through Skyrim ... (No DLC needed)
descriptionHtml:
[b][i]Place 3 Harpies wherever you want through Skyrim ...[/i][/b] (No DLC needed)



This mod adds the ability to quickly create armies of Harpies (5, 15, 50, 100 ... MORE ?... ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18042608154716616015685862.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/04/26//18042608154716616015685862.jpg[/img][/url]

To obtain these Harpies (« Harpy », « Harpy Matriarch » and «Swarming Harpy»), simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in Whiterun (Merchants: [i][b]Belethor at the Belethor's General Goods, Elrindir at the Drunken Huntsman, Carlotta [/b][/i]) Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Harpies ...

« Harpy » and « Swarming Harpy » are staying at the choosen location

The « Harpy Matriarch » is following you …


In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, [b][i]you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]



[b] Credits[/b]

Mihail Romanov for the Harpies in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90894/] Harpies- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- daggerfall- eso) [/url] (with also [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/437824] Anton0028 [/url], reaperix, RustyShackleford69, Aviform, Renthal311, CD PROJEKT RED)
"Feel free to use my mod in your projects"
author: gg77
